short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates a new Google Form™ so you can create a new survey in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create a new Google Form™ in one click with this extension. 

If you are not signed into your Google Account, you will be directed to the login screen.
